item.title: Sleep better with Raspberry Pi automated white noise
item.author: Safta Catalin Mihai
item.description: Theory Having complete silence while you sleep ðŸ˜´ may seem nice, but in fact can lead to trouble if the outside environment is not also completely quiet. A cat may meowðŸ±, a car may honk ðŸš—, your upstairs neighbour can wake up for a late-night snack ðŸŸâ€¦ All these sounds will seem louder if your room is completely quiet. The human perception of sound is nonlinear. Thatâ€™s why itâ€™s measured in decibels.
